title: Capacity Limits in 5G Prompt a 6G Focus on Infrastructure
description: When the head of Nokia Bell Labs core research talks about “lessons learned” from 5G, he’s doing something rare in telecom: admitting a flagship technology didn’t quite work out as planned.That candor matters now, too, because Bell Labs core research presiden…
content:
